metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11577 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Liblouis 3.5.0 has a Segmentation fault in lou_logPrint in logging.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-11577` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblouis-bin - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.1
liblouis-data - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.1
liblouis14 - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.1
python-louis - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.1
python3-louis - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: liblouis package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.5.0-1ubuntu0.1').
